settings.waterproofing_level_1: Stay dry in drizzle or light showers with our Fluorocarbon-free durable water repellant finish.
settings.waterproofing_level_2: Stay dry on longer adventures. 10,000 HH rating and recycled (GRS certified) 2-layer to 2.5-layer fabric will protect in short downpours or continual rain.
settings.waterproofing_level_3: High performance Fluorocarbon-free waterproof. 20,000 HH rating and recycled (GRS certified) 3-layer fabric will protect against torrential rain and strong winds.
settings.warmth_level_1: A lightweight, packable shell layer, built for adventure.
settings.warmth_level_2: Lightweight recycled (GRS certified) insulation to keep you warm on cool to cold days.
settings.warmth_level_3: Stay warm, whatever the weather. Filled with down-free, fully recycled (GRS certified) A-form insulation that mimics the high-loft of down and traps heat effectively.
settings.breathability_level_1: Stay warm, not sweaty. With our high-loft insulation and microporous membrane, let water vapour escape whilst keeping the heat in.
settings.breathability_level_2: With a 10,000g breathability rating you stay dry, not sweaty. The microporous inner film wicks moisture away the harder you work.
settings.breathability_level_3: Stay active, with a 15,000g breathability rating. The breathable waterproof membrane allows water vapour to easily escape.

settings.banner_text: Born for the sea. Built for adventure.

settings.title: Our go-to waterproofing
settings.body: The features that make this product so great
